item.title: 高盛任命 Aek Shyam 为全球房地产集团并购部主管
item.description: 根据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，高盛已任命 Aekloveya Shyam 为全球房地产集团兼并与收购 (M&A) 主管。【原文：Goldman Sachs has appointed Aekloveya Shyam as head of mergers & acquisitions (M&A) in the Global Real Estate Group, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.】

item.title: 力拓与汉考克勘探公司将开发价值 16.1 亿美元的 Hope Downs 2 项目
item.description: 澳大利亚力拓公司（Rio Tinto）和汉考克勘探公司（Hancock Prospecting）周二表示，将投资 16.1 亿美元开发位于西澳大利亚皮尔巴拉地区的霍普唐斯 2 号铁矿石项目。【原文：Australia's Rio Tinto , and Hancock Prospecting will invest $1.61 billion to develop the Hope Downs 2 iron ore project in Western Australia's Pilbara region, Rio Tinto said on Tuesday.】

item.title: 星巴克称目前不考虑全面出售中国业务
item.description: 在中国财经杂志《财新》报道了美国连锁咖啡馆星巴克未透露从何处获得的信息后，星巴克表示目前不考虑全面出售其在中国的业务。【原文：U.S. cafe chain Starbucks said it is not currently considering a full sale of its China operations, after Chinese financial magazine Caixin reported that it was without disclosing where it obtained the information.】

item.title: 阿达尼的孟买机场与阿波罗领导的投资集团达成 7.5 亿美元协议
item.description: 美国私人资本集团阿达尼机场控股公司（Adani Airport Holdings）的子公司孟买国际机场有限公司（Mumbai International Airport Ltd）周一表示，该公司已获得由阿波罗管理基金的附属公司和其他长期支持者牵头的集团投资的 7.5 亿美元。【原文：Mumbai International Airport Ltd, a subsidiary of Adani Airport Holdings, has secured a $750 million investment from a group led by affiliates of Apollo-managed funds and other long-term backers, the U.S. private capital group said on Monday.】

item.title: 陷入危机的日产汽车准备在股东大会上接受扭亏为盈计划的审查
item.description: 在本周二举行的年度股东大会上，日产汽车将就其日益加深的危机面临大量审查，投资者还将就一项激进提案进行投票，该提案敦促日产汽车对上市子公司日产夏特采取行动。【原文：Nissan Motor will face plenty of scrutiny over its deepening crisis at an annual general meeting on Tuesday, where investors will also vote on an activist proposal urging it to take action on listed subsidiary Nissan Shatai .】

item.title: 澳大利亚明星娱乐公司任命黄金海岸赌场临时首席执行官
item.description: 澳大利亚赌场集团 Star Entertainment 周二表示，已任命詹妮弗-克罗宁（Jennifer Cronin）为旗下 Star Gold Coast 赌场的临时首席执行官。【原文：Australian casino group Star Entertainment said on Tuesday it has appointed Jennifer Cronin as the interim chief executive officer for its Star Gold Coast casino.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布以色列与伊朗停火后，美元在广泛的风险反弹中下跌
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普宣布以色列与伊朗停火后，美元周二下跌，而澳元和新西兰元则上涨，这一消息令投资者欢呼雀跃，并引发了整个市场的风险反弹。【原文：The dollar fell on Tuesday while the Australian and New Zealand dollars rose after U.S. President Donald Trump announced a ceasefire between Israel and Iran, in news that sent investors cheering and sparked a risk rally across markets.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布伊以停火，亚洲股市欢呼雀跃
item.description: 周二，在美国总统唐纳德-特朗普称伊朗和以色列已同意停火后，华尔街期货上涨，美元在亚洲市场走软，油价因供应中断的担忧减弱而大幅跳水。【原文：Wall Street futures rose and the dollar eased in Asia on Tuesday after U.S. President Donald Trump said Iran and Israel had agreed to a ceasefire, sending oil prices into a deep dive as concerns over supply disruptions ebbed.】

item.title: 亚马逊未来三年将在英国投资 540 亿美元
item.description: 亚马逊深化了对英国的承诺，这家电子商务巨头表示计划在未来三年投资 400 亿英镑（540 亿美元），英国政府将此举视为对其经济政策投下的信任票。【原文：Amazon has deepened its commitment to Britain, with the e-commerce giant saying it plans to invest 40 billion pounds ($54 billion) over the next three years, a move the UK government hailed as a vote of confidence in its economic policies.】

item.title: 独家报道中国地方政府推动 "零里程 "二手车出口，夸大销量和增长数字
item.description: 多年来，中国汽车业一直在通过一个由政府支持的灰色市场来抬高汽车销量，这个灰色市场将刚下线的新车进行登记，然后作为 "二手车 "运往海外。【原文：China's auto industry has inflated car sales for years through a burgeoning government-backed grey market that registers new cars right off the assembly line and then ships them overseas as "used" vehicles.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布伊朗与以色列停火后投资者的反应
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普周一表示，以色列和伊朗之间的 "完全彻底 "停火将生效，以期结束两国之间的冲突。【原文：U.S. President Donald Trump said on Monday that a "complete and total" ceasefire between Israel and Iran will go into force with a view to ending the conflict between the two nations.】

item.title: 特朗普宣布以色列与伊朗停火，美国原油期货下跌逾 3 美元
item.description: 美国原油期货周二跌至一周多以来的最低水平，原因是美国总统唐纳德-特朗普称伊朗和以色列之间已达成停火协议，解除了该地区供应中断的担忧。【原文：U.S. crude futures fell on Tuesday to their lowest level in more than a week as U.S. President Donald Trump said a ceasefire has been agreed between Iran and Israel, relieving worries of supply disruption in the area.】

item.title: 美国联邦储蓄委员会结束对美国银行抵押贷款报告案的监督
item.description: 根据本月早些时候的一份文件，美国消费者金融保护局（U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau）与美国银行（Bank of America）达成了一项监督协议，该协议与美国银行提交不准确抵押贷款数据的指控有关。【原文：The U.S. Consumer Financial Protection Bureau has closed an oversight agreement with Bank of America tied to allegations that the lender submitted inaccurate mortgage data, according to a filing dated earlier this month.】

item.title: 媒体事务"（Media Matters）起诉阻止美国联邦贸易委员会（FTC）对马斯克抵制 X 的指控进行调查
item.description: 媒体事务 "组织周一要求法院阻止美国联邦贸易委员会对媒体监督机构是否协调广告抵制的调查，称这是对该组织批评埃隆-马斯克（Elon Musk）的报复，而埃隆-马斯克是唐纳德-特朗普（Donald Trump）总统竞选活动的主要捐助者。【原文：Media Matters asked a court on Monday to block the U.S. Federal Trade Commission's probe into whether media watchdogs coordinated advertising boycotts, calling it retaliation for the group's criticism of Elon Musk, a major donor to Donald Trump's presidential campaign.】

item.title: 独家报道特朗普组织偿还纽约华尔街 40 号的贷款
item.description: 特朗普组织周一表示，它已偿还了曼哈顿华尔街 40 号办公楼的 1.6 亿美元贷款，分析师估计其中约 1.14 亿美元尚未偿还。【原文：The Trump Organization said on Monday it had repaid a $160 million loan on the 40 Wall Street office tower in Manhattan, of which analysts estimate about $114 million was outstanding.】

item.title: 特斯拉因 Model S 在新泽西撞车导致三人死亡而被起诉
item.description: 去年 9 月，特斯拉 2024 款 Model S 配备了自动驾驶和 "完全自动驾驶功能"，在新泽西州花园州立公园大道上发生车祸，造成三人死亡。【原文：Tesla was sued on Monday by the estates of three people killed last September when their 2024 Model S equipped with Autopilot and "full self-driving capability" features crashed on New Jersey's Garden State Parkway.】

item.title: T-Mobile 将于 10 月推出基于卫星网络的数据服务
item.description: T-Mobile 营销、战略和产品负责人在贝尔维尤举行的一次现场活动中表示，T-Mobile 将于 10 月初在其卫星对蜂窝网络上推出一项数据服务，该服务由 SpaceX 的 Starlink 提供支持。【原文：T-Mobile will introduce a data service on its satellite-to-cell network, powered by SpaceX's Starlink, at the start of October, the company's head of marketing, strategy and products said during a live event in Bellevue.】

item.title: 据彭博新闻社报道，NHTSA 就在线视频中出现的机器人出租车问题联系特斯拉
item.description: 据彭博新闻社周一报道，美国国家公路交通安全管理局（National Highway Traffic Safety Administration）在看到网上关于机器人出租车（robotaxi）首次亮相后出现问题的视频后，正在向特斯拉寻求信息。【原文：The National Highway Traffic Safety Administration is seeking information from Tesla after seeing online videos of issues on robotaxi after its debut, Bloomberg News reported on Monday.】

item.title: 维珍澳大利亚公司 4.39 亿美元首次公开募股后股票将首次上市
item.description: 维珍澳大利亚公司将在首次公开募股中募集 6.85 亿澳元（4.39 亿美元），并于周二重返澳大利亚证券交易所。【原文：Virgin Australia will return to the Australian Securities Exchange on Tuesday after raising A$685 million ($439 million) in an initial public offering, a transaction dealmakers hope will revive a flat-lining listings market.】

item.title: 交易日 登上 "冒险 "过山车
item.description: 交易日【原文：TRADING DAY】

item.title: 奶牛科技初创企业融资 1 亿美元，成为新西兰最新的独角兽企业
item.description: 农业科技初创企业 Halter 以 10 亿美元的估值融资 1 亿美元，成为新西兰罕见的独角兽企业之一，同时该公司正加紧在美国扩张其面向奶农的牛群管理平台。【原文：Agtech startup Halter has raised $100 million at a $1 billion valuation, making it one of New Zealand's rare unicorns as it ramps up U.S. expansion of its cattle management platform for dairy farmers.】

item.title: 阿根廷 15 亿欧元 GDP 认股权证持有人申请美国承认英国判决
item.description: 阿根廷 15 亿欧元 GDP 认股权证的持有人周一申请美国法院承认英国法院要求阿根廷对该债务承担责任的判决。【原文：Holders of Argentina's 1.5 billion euro-denominated GDP warrants filed on Monday for U.S. courts to recognize English court judgments that hold Argentina liable for that debt.】

item.title: 消息人士称霍尔木兹海峡紧张局势升级推高中东战争风险保险成本
item.description: 保险业人士周一表示，美国和以色列对伊朗的袭击以及德黑兰的报复行动已使上周中东和海湾地区的货运保险价格上涨了一倍。【原文：U.S. and Israeli attacks on Iran and Tehran's reprisals have doubled the price of insuring shipments to the Middle East and the Gulf in the last week, insurance sources said on Monday.】

item.title: 美联储不再监管银行的 "声誉风险
item.description: 美联储周一宣布，它将指示其监管机构在审查银行时不再考虑 "声誉风险"，从而废除了一直是业界投诉焦点的一项指标。【原文：The Federal Reserve announced on Monday it was directing its supervisors to no longer consider "reputational risk" when examining banks, scrapping a metric that had been a focus of industry complaints.】

item.title: 美联储主席古尔斯比称关税迄今未产生预期影响
item.description: 芝加哥联邦储备银行行长古尔斯比（Austan Goolsbee）周一表示，到目前为止，关税激增对经济的影响比预期的要小。【原文：Federal Reserve Bank of Chicago President Austan Goolsbee said on Monday that thus far the surge in tariffs has had a more modest impact on the economy relative to what was expected.】

item.title: 威士卡败诉 "耗卡 "香草礼品卡欺诈案
item.description: 周一，Visa 打败了一起由消费者提出的集体诉讼，消费者指控这家全球最大的银行卡支付网络没有警告其预付费 "Vanilla "礼品卡容易被盗取。【原文：Visa defeated a proposed class action lawsuit on Monday by consumers who accused the world's largest card payments network of failing to warn that its prepaid "Vanilla" gift cards were susceptible to being drained by thieves.】

item.title: Compass 起诉 Zillow，指控其扼杀房屋挂牌竞争
item.description: 美国销售量最大的住宅房地产经纪公司 Compass 周一起诉 Zillow，指控这家美国最大的在线房地产门户网站违反联邦反垄断法，合谋限制私人住宅上市。【原文：Compass , the largest U.S. residential real estate brokerage by sales volume, sued Zillow on Monday, accusing the nation's largest online real estate portal of violating federal antitrust law by conspiring to restrict private home listings.】

item.title: ERG 计划明年在哈萨克斯坦生产关键矿物镓
item.description: 欧亚资源集团（Eurasian Resources Group）周一发布消息称，该公司计划投资2000万美元，从明年起在哈萨克斯坦利用铝土矿生产关键矿物镓。【原文：Eurasian Resources Group plans to invest $20 million in facilities to produce critical mineral gallium in Kazakhstan from next year, from the bauxite ore it processes to produce alumina, the company said in a release on Monday.】

item.title: 特斯拉希望美国对机器人出租车的部署情况不予公开
item.description: 特斯拉在周一发布的一封信中告诉美国监管机构，特斯拉对其在得克萨斯州部署的机器人出租车安全性问题的所有答复都属于商业机密信息，不应公开。【原文：Tesla told U.S. regulators that all of its answers to questions on the safety of its robotaxi deployment in Texas are confidential business information and should not be made public, according to a letter released Monday.】

item.title: 北方信托称将全力保持独立性
item.description: 华尔街日报》的一篇报道称，纽约梅隆银行已与这家资产和财富管理公司接触，表达了合并的意向，而北方信托周一表示，该银行将全力保持独立。【原文：Northern Trust is fully committed to remaining independent, the bank said on Monday, after a Wall Street Journal report said Bank of New York Mellon had approached the asset and wealth manager to express interest in a merger.】
